name: Small Business Standards
membership:
Member of ETSI (European Telecommunications Standards Institute)
Partnership Agreement with CEN-CENELEC
goal:
Small Business Standards (SBS) is a European non-profit association under Belgian law (aisbl) created in 2013. SBS was established with the support of the European Commission to represent European SMEs in the standard making process at European and international levels. Moreover, it aims at raising SME awareness about the benefits of standards and at encouraging them to get involved in the standardisation process.
SBS members are national and European sectoral and inter-professional associations representing SMEs all over Europe. The membership is open to all associations matching these criteria.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Implementation of Regulation (EU) 1025/2012 to ensure representation of SMEs in the European Standardisation System, as stipulated in Annex III of the Regulation.
